fig.label: Figure 1.

caption.p: Innate and adaptive immune response to a pathogen (Virus/Bacteria/Parasite).

fig.attrib: (1) Recruitment of antigen presenting cell (APC) at the injection site. (2) Enhancement of antigen uptake. (3) Enhancement of Th2 response. (4) Enhancement of humoral immune response. (5) Improvement in inflammasomes of macrophages.
